Title: 40908 - # Places You Must Visit Before They Disappear
Direction: 675 words. Make a list of 4 to 8 places that are vanishing because of environmental or other factors. Some places you may want to include in the list are the Great Barrier Reef, Leaning Tower of Pisa, and Dead Sea Beach. The resource links list dozens of other options. You can include the client link and keyword in any section by mentioning that the reader will want to bring a smartphone that has an excellent camera for capturing memories. Your audience is interested in travel.
Extra Writer Notes: Example AT: capture memories with the iPhone 6's iSight camera from T-Mobile

Title: 40909 - # Ways Your Smartphone Can Help You Enhance Travel
Direction: 675 words. Make a list of 4 to 8 ways a smartphone can help someone while traveling. You may want to write about how having a phone helps travelers stay in touch with home, apps that help them find interesting spots to visit, and maps that show them how to reach their destinations. You can include the client link and keyword in any section, but mention a feature of the iPhone 6 that makes it particularly good or travelers. Your audience is interested in travel.
Anchor Text: iphone 6 unrelated keyword (this could be “more information”, “click here”)
Extra Writer Notes: Example AT: click here to learn more

Title: 40910 - # Great Vegetarian Cooking Apps for Meatless Mondays
Direction: 675 words. Whether you're a committed vegetarian or you go meat-free now and again, there are some great apps that can give you some cooking inspiration. Highlight 4-8 of these, noting any interesting features of them, how much they cost, and what platforms they're available on. You should be able to use the client's anchor text in a paragraph about an Android app, perhaps one that has great pictures of the dishes that would look best on a high-resolution screen. Your target audience is interested in food.
Anchor Text: samsung galaxy s6 branded term (brand/client name)
Extra Writer Notes: Example AT: such as the Samsung Galaxy S6's high-resolution screen

Title: 40911 - Tips for Designing Websites Smartphone Users Will Love
Direction: 675 words. As more people browse the web from their smartphones rather than their desktop computers, it's becoming more important for website designers to design sites that work well on these mobile devices. Offer 4-8 tips for designing good mobile websites. You could perhaps use the client link in a section about using a minimalist design, noting that while it's easier for people with large smartphones like the Samsung Galaxy S6 to navigate a complicated website, it's much harder for people with small smartphones. Your target audience is interested in web design.
Anchor Text: samsung galaxy s6 branded variation (client name + keywords)
Extra Writer Notes: Example AT: T-Mobile's Samsung Galaxy S6 with a 5.1 inch screen

Title: 40914 - # Exciting Apps Empowering the World's Women
Direction: 675 words. There are some really unique, innovative apps helping to empower women around the world. List 4-8 of these, making sure to explain why each app is empowering, what it does, what its features are, how much it costs, and what platforms it's available on. You should be able to incorporate the client link in a section about an app that works with an iPhone. Since the target blog is a site focusing on women and careers, make sure the apps are really empowering. An app that helps women take control of their weight isn't going to fly with this audience. Try to include a variety of apps to make the article interesting.
Anchor Text: iphone 6s plus unrelated keyword (this could be “more information”, “click here”)
Extra Writer Notes: Example AT: to learn more, click here

Title: 40915 - # Photos to Capture on Your Trip to NYC
Direction: 675 words. List 4-8 locations where you should go to take photos in NYC while on vacation. Include some notable skyscrapers as well as parks and other famous places. You can include the client link by saying that you can take photos with your phone and there's no need for a fancy camera. Your audience is people who like to travel and those interested in going to NYC.
Anchor Text: lg v10 branded variation (client name + keywords)
Extra Writer Notes: Example AT: T-Mobile's LG V10 with a 16MP camera

Title: 40916 - # Things to Plan for on Your Trip to Europe
Direction: 675 words. Write about how fun a trip to Europe would be and all the destinations you could visit. Then, list 4-8 things you need to do to get ready, such as getting a passport, figuring out a calling plan, and researching hotels and flights. Include the client link in a paragraph about phone plans so that it sounds natural. Your audience is people who like to travel and have fun.
Extra Writer Notes: Example AT: T-Mobile's Galaxy S6 as a traveling companion
